mapper.select: SELECT EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_HIST_SEQ AS faclHistSeq /* 시설 내역 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.PARTNER_CD_TYPE AS partnerCdType /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_DIV AS faclDiv /* 시설 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.GOODS_CD AS goodsCd /* 상품 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_NM_KOR AS faclNmKor /* 시설 명 한글, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_NM_ENG AS faclNmEng /* 시설 명 영문, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.ROOM_TYPE AS roomType /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.ROOM_CLASS AS roomClass /* 숙소 등급, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.SALE_START_DD AS saleStartDd /* 판매 시작 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.SALE_END_DD AS saleEndDd /* 판매 종료 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.CHECK_IN_TM AS checkInTm /* 체크인 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.CHECK_OUT_TM AS checkOutTm /* 체크아웃 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.AREA_CD AS areaCd /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.ADDR_TYPE AS addrType /* 주소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.ADDR AS addr /* 주소, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.POST AS post /* 우편번호, VARCHAR2(7) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.TEL_NUM AS telNum /* 전화 번호, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.COORD_Y AS coordY /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.COORD_X AS coordX /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.MIN_AMT AS minAmt /* 최저 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.DETAIL_DESC_PC AS detailDescPc /* 상세 설명 PC, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.DETAIL_DESC_M AS detailDescM /* 상세 설명 모바일, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.TRIP_PROP_ID AS tripPropId /* 트립어드바이저 프로퍼티 ID, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.MAIN_IMG_URL AS mainImgUrl /* 대표 이미지 URL, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.IMG_CHANGE_YN AS imgChangeYn /* 이미지 변경 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.SALE_STOP_DT AS saleStopDt /* 판매 중지 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.API_SYNC_DT AS apiSyncDt /* API 동기화 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.CONFIRM_STATUS AS confirmStatus /* 확정 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_STATUS AS faclStatus /* 시설 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.REJECT_CONTENT AS rejectContent /* 반려 내용, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.USE_YN AS useYn /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ FROM EZC_FACL_HIST /* 시설 정보 내역 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_HIST_SEQ = #{faclHistSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 내역 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_FACL_HIST /* 시설 정보 내역 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_HIST_SEQ = #{faclHistSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 내역 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_FACL_HIST.DETAIL_DESC_PC LIKE '%' || #{detailDescPc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 상세 설명 PC, VARCHAR2(4000) */
AND EZC_FACL_HIST.DETAIL_DESC_M LIKE '%' || #{detailDescM, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 상세 설명 모바일, VARCHAR2(4000) */
AND EZC_FACL_HIST.REJECT_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{rejectContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 반려 내용, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_HIST_SEQ AS faclHistSeq /* 시설 내역 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.PARTNER_CD_TYPE AS partnerCdType /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_DIV AS faclDiv /* 시설 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.GOODS_CD AS goodsCd /* 상품 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_NM_KOR AS faclNmKor /* 시설 명 한글, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_NM_ENG AS faclNmEng /* 시설 명 영문, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.ROOM_TYPE AS roomType /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.ROOM_CLASS AS roomClass /* 숙소 등급, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.SALE_START_DD AS saleStartDd /* 판매 시작 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.SALE_END_DD AS saleEndDd /* 판매 종료 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.CHECK_IN_TM AS checkInTm /* 체크인 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.CHECK_OUT_TM AS checkOutTm /* 체크아웃 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.AREA_CD AS areaCd /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.ADDR_TYPE AS addrType /* 주소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.ADDR AS addr /* 주소, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.POST AS post /* 우편번호, VARCHAR2(7) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.TEL_NUM AS telNum /* 전화 번호, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.COORD_Y AS coordY /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.COORD_X AS coordX /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.MIN_AMT AS minAmt /* 최저 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.DETAIL_DESC_PC AS detailDescPc /* 상세 설명 PC, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.DETAIL_DESC_M AS detailDescM /* 상세 설명 모바일, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.TRIP_PROP_ID AS tripPropId /* 트립어드바이저 프로퍼티 ID, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.MAIN_IMG_URL AS mainImgUrl /* 대표 이미지 URL, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.IMG_CHANGE_YN AS imgChangeYn /* 이미지 변경 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.SALE_STOP_DT AS saleStopDt /* 판매 중지 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.API_SYNC_DT AS apiSyncDt /* API 동기화 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.CONFIRM_STATUS AS confirmStatus /* 확정 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_STATUS AS faclStatus /* 시설 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.REJECT_CONTENT AS rejectContent /* 반려 내용, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.USE_YN AS useYn /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ FROM EZC_FACL_HIST /* 시설 정보 내역 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_HIST_SEQ = #{param.faclHistSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 내역 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_FACL_HIST.DETAIL_DESC_PC LIKE '%' || #{param.detailDescPc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 상세 설명 PC, VARCHAR2(4000) */
AND EZC_FACL_HIST.DETAIL_DESC_M LIKE '%' || #{param.detailDescM, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 상세 설명 모바일, VARCHAR2(4000) */
AND EZC_FACL_HIST.REJECT_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{param.rejectContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 반려 내용, VARCHAR2(1000) */
AND EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_CD = #{param.faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
ORDER BY EZC_FACL_HIST.FACL_HIST_SEQ DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_FACL_HIST SET /* 시설 정보 내역 */ PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,PARTNER_CD_TYPE = #{partnerCdType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,FACL_DIV = #{faclDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,GOODS_CD = #{goodsCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상품 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,FACL_NM_KOR = #{faclNmKor, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 명 한글, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,FACL_NM_ENG = #{faclNmEng, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 명 영문, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,ROOM_TYPE = #{roomType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,ROOM_CLASS = #{roomClass, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 숙소 등급, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,SALE_START_DD = #{saleStartDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 판매 시작 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,SALE_END_DD = #{saleEndDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 판매 종료 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,CHECK_IN_TM = #{checkInTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,CHECK_OUT_TM = #{checkOutTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,ADDR_TYPE = #{addrType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 주소 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,ADDR = #{addr, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 주소, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,POST = #{post, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 우편번호, VARCHAR2(7) */ ,TEL_NUM = #{telNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 전화 번호, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,COORD_Y = #{coordY, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,COORD_X = #{coordX, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MIN_AMT = #{minAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 최저 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,DETAIL_DESC_PC = #{detailDescPc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상세 설명 PC, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,DETAIL_DESC_M = #{detailDescM, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상세 설명 모바일, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,TRIP_PROP_ID = #{tripPropId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 트립어드바이저 프로퍼티 ID, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,MAIN_IMG_URL = #{mainImgUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 대표 이미지 URL, VARCHAR2(200) */ ,IMG_CHANGE_YN = #{imgChangeYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 이미지 변경 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,SALE_STOP_DT = #{saleStopDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 판매 중지 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,API_SYNC_DT = #{apiSyncDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* API 동기화 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,CONFIRM_STATUS = #{confirmStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 확정 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,FACL_STATUS = #{faclStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 시설 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,REJECT_CONTENT = #{rejectContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 반려 내용, VARCHAR2(1000) */ ,USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ WHERE 1=1 AND FACL_HIST_SEQ = #{faclHistSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 내역 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_FACL_HIST /* 시설 정보 내역 */ WHERE 1=1 AND FACL_HIST_SEQ = #{faclHistSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 내역 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
